summary: Sign On The Spot feature testing complete. All backend APIs working correctly (14/14 tests passed). Frontend UI verified - Sign On The Spot button, in-person signing dialog, and Mark as Signed functionality all working.
critical_code_review_comments: SignNow integration returns MOCK responses when SignNow credentials are not fully configured - this is expected behavior
The mock flow allows testing the complete UI flow without real SignNow integration
Contract status transitions correctly: draft -> in_person_pending -> signed
All data-testid attributes are properly set for testing (sign-in-person-{id}, complete-in-person-signing)
seed_data_creation: Test contracts created with TEST_ prefix during backend testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sign On The Spot feature is fully functional. SignNow API returns mock responses since full OAuth is not configured. The mock flow allows complete UI testing.

POST /api/contracts/.details: Creates new contract from template with claim_id validation

POST /api/contracts/{id}/sign-in-person.details: Creates in-person signing link, updates status to 'in_person_pending', returns mock signing URL

POST /api/contracts/{id}/complete-signin.details: Marks contract as signed, sets signed_at timestamp, sets signed_in_person flag

GET /api/contracts/.details: Returns contracts list with stats (total, signed, pending, draft)

GET /api/contracts/templates.details: Returns available templates including Care Claims PA Agreement

frontend_sign_on_spot_button.details: Sign On The Spot button appears on draft contracts with green styling

frontend_in_person_dialog.details: Dialog shows contract info, client name, 4-step instructions, Cancel and Mark as Signed buttons

frontend_continue_signing.details: Continue Signing button appears on in_person_pending contracts

frontend_contract_stats.details: Stats cards show Total Contracts, Signed, Pending, Drafts counts

frontend_create_contract_dialog.details: Create Contract dialog shows all form sections with pre-fill from claim option

mocked_apis_list: SignNow embedded signing link - returns demo URL (/contracts/{id}/sign-demo) when SignNow not fully configured

status_flow_verified.draft_to_in_person_pending: PASS - sign-in-person endpoint updates status correctly
status_flow_verified.in_person_pending_to_signed: PASS - complete-signing endpoint updates status correctly
